definition: washbowl/basin for washing hands and face/CL:個|个[ge4]
basin/flower pot/unit of volume equal to 12 斗[dou3] and 8 升[sheng1], approx 128 liters/CL:個|个[ge4]
washbowl/basin for washing hands and face

sentences.english: What exactly am I to do with an empty washbowl?
sentences.chinese: 我拿这个洗脸盆作什么？

sentences.english: My brother and I took a small washbasin came to the pond.
sentences.chinese: 我和弟弟拿着一个小脸盆来到池塘边。

sentences.english: There is a hole in my washbasin,and the water is running away.
sentences.chinese: 我的脸盆上有一个洞，水都流走了。

sentences.english: I asked Kordax if I could use his washbowl .
sentences.chinese: 我问克达斯能否用他的洗脸盆。

sentences.english: Bring me a washbasin and a pail.
sentences.chinese: 给我拿一个脸盆和一个水桶。

sentences.english: Run the hot water in the sink or fill up a basin with hot water.
sentences.chinese: 运行在水槽中的热水，或填补了用热水一个脸盆。

sentences.english: In the mornings I would sneak the soiled sheets to the washbasin and soak them.
sentences.chinese: 早晨起来，我偷偷地把尿湿的被单放到脸盆里浸上。

sentences.english: Every morning it was he who put handbill in our washbowl .
sentences.chinese: 每天早晨，我们洗脸盆里塞上的传单，就出自他之手。

sentences.english: I'm interested in buying a new washbasin.
sentences.chinese: 我想买一个新的洗脸盆。

sentences.english: Take the bus down the basin cry, cry tears of you can wash your face.
sentences.chinese: 想哭就拿脸盆放下巴，哭泪了还可以洗洗脸。

sentences.english: Have you prepared a new washbowl, Thomas?
sentences.chinese: 你准备了一个新的洗脸盆吗，托马斯？

sentences.english: Against one wall of her room stands a chestnut bureau. A porcelain wash basin sits on the bureau.
sentences.chinese: 靠墙有张栗色的化妆台，上面放着一个瓷脸盆。

sentences.english: The blacksmith pounded an iron sheet out to a wash-basin.
sentences.chinese: 铁匠把一张铁皮敲打成一个脸盆。

sentences.english: I finished shaving and put my face down into the bowl and washed it with cold water.
sentences.chinese: 我刮好脸，把脸浸到脸盆里，用凉水洗一洗。

sentences.english: The washbasin had a small chip.
Every morning, we are taking washbasin and small bottle.
sentences.chinese: 每天早上上学，我们都要带上脸盆和墨水瓶。

definition: washbowl/basin for washing hands and face
thermos bottle/vacuum bottle/hot water dispenser (appliance)/CL:個|个[ge4]
